summary: A night of terror in a sleazy nightspot, when an over-the-hill football star holds a thrill-seeking couple captive.
cast: Anthony Quinn|Carol Ohmart|Arthur Franz|Jay Robinson|Kathryn Grant|Nehemiah Persoff|Paul Stewart|Nestor Paiva|Maureen Stephenson|Michael Ross|James Bronte|William Phipps|Joseph J. Greene|Barbara Nichols|Buddy DeFranco|Jana Mason|Carl Milletaire
title: Una fiesta sin fin
